secret_rule: Pairs of items can be brought to the picnic if they are both fruits, but one must be a citrus fruit and the other must be a berry.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "orange" and "blueberry" and "lemon" and "raspberry".

okay, based on the examples provided by the game master, i think the secret rule might be:

the rule is that the items must be different types of fruits or berries.

the examples given - "orange", "blueberry", "lemon", and "raspberry" - all fit this pattern of being various types of fruits and berries.

so my best guess for the secret rule in this "guess the rule" game is that the items allowed must be different kinds of fruits or berries.
